Plot: A chronicle of Brittany Murphy's rise to fame in the 1990s, her struggles with self-esteem, and her tragic early death.
Title: The Brittany Murphy Story
Writer: Peter Hunziker (teleplay), Peter Hunziker, Cynthia Riddle (teleplay), Cynthia Riddle
Actors: Amanda Fuller, Sherilyn Fenn, Eric Petersen, Chloë Crampton
